mapper.select: select member_id ,member_nm ,member_birth ,to_char(member_indate,'YY-MM-DD') as member_indate from member_table order by member_nm
select member_id ,member_pw ,member_nm ,member_birth ,to_char(member_indate,'YY-MM-DD') as member_indate from member_table where member_id = #{member_id}

select member_id ,member_nm ,member_birth ,to_char(member_indate,'YY-MM-DD') as member_indate from member_table where to_date(member_birth,'YYYYMMDD') between to_date(#{start_date},'YYYYMMDD') and to_date(#{end_date},'YYYYMMDD') order by member_nm
